dcterms:description: A dataset containing movie reviews annotated with sentiment labels for binary and fine-grained sentiment classification tasks.

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of sentence pairs annotated with relatedness scores for evaluating compositional distributional semantic models.
dcterms:title: Sentences Involving Compositional Knowledge (SICK)
